content: **christmas snowman ornament crochet pattern** easy and cute crochet pattern to make a small snowman ornament perfect for christmas this amigurumi design features a bobble hat and scarf for extra charm ideal for advanced beginners the snowman crochet pattern is available as a pdf with instant download the crochet pattern is 6 pages long and written in english and us crochet terms the pattern contains plenty of progress photos to guide you along and is an easy skill level project **supplies** 3mm & 4mm crochet hook dk weight yarn scissors sewing needle 10mm safety eyes toy stuffing black embroidery thread **yarn** weight dk / light worsted/ #3 brand stylecraft squeeze me dk a white b black c orange d pink e green total 49 yards **gauge** 3mm hook 2″ x 2″ swatch = 10 row of 10 single_crochet 4mm hook 2″ x 2″ swatch = 8 row of 7 single_crochet **finished size** height 10cm x diameter 18cm **abbreviations us terms ** chain chain magic_ring magic_ring r round / row single_crochet single_crochet 2sc 2 single_crochet in 1 space increase decrease single_crochet 2 together decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch st/sts stitch/stitches **skill level** easy **notes** a free online basic version of this crochet pattern is available at https //hookfully com/easy-crochet-snowman-ornament-free-pattern/
